one: ^You did it Captain! with the anomaly fixed, all we need to do now is to take a scan of this data and restore our database. That would enable the ship's systems to be able to restore the missing components! Just stand still so I can get a scan of the information on the board!
two: ^And with that we are done! whenever you are ready to leave the simulation, let me know. We have important matters to attend to!
^I want to stay here a bit more.
three: ^No problem! but I would suggest hurrying.
